channel.title: String on xy1m
channel.description: Recent content in String on xy1m

item.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
item.description: Given a string S, find the longest palindromic substring in S. You may assume that the maximum length of S is 1000, and there exists one unique longest palindromic substring.

item.title: Surrounded Regions
item.description:
Given a 2D board containing ‘X’ and ‘O’, capture all regions surrounded by ‘X’.

A region is captured by flipping all ‘O’s into ‘X’s in that surrounded region. For example,

item.title: Integer to English Words
